I heartily congratulate you on the occasion of Novruz holiday, and wish each of you good health, happiness and spring mood.
The spring holiday, which is a treasure of national existence and spirituality, is an invaluable memory of our wise ancestors to today's generations.
The unchanging harmony of the universe and the feast of eternal laws are the bright embodiment of our centuries-old culture,
Novruz traditions have become an integral part of our people's mentality and have an exceptional place in our values ​​system.
Encouraging communication among members of the community, strengthening sincerity and high moral (cont) http://t.co/qGF2MQ8Pyp
The spring holiday has not been erased from the minds in the most difficult times of our past and has not left us confused in the future.
Thanks to the deep-rooted philosophy of our souls, it has become the subject of the last century (cont) http://t.co/96vXHb1EvM
The ancient Novruz ceremonies, which have accumulated the richness of our moral culture, have become a globalization (cont) http://t.co/8OrDvFdZ5F
The arrival of the summer comes with a large-scale (cont) http://t.co/j4ThPBB1H1
Together with us in the light of the idea of ​​Azerbaijanism, thousands of our compatriots are far away from our country.
As a symbol of our solidarity, this national holiday will give every family a lot of joy and prosperity.
Happy New Year holidays for all of you!
